Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends living in New York City?
Questions.Explanation: Friends is a popular sitcom that revolves around the lives of six friends in Manhattan.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the spaceship in the TV show 'Firefly'?
Questions.Explanation: Serenity is the name of the Firefly-class spaceship that serves as the main setting for the show.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional world of Westeros?
Questions.Explanation: Game of Thrones is a fantasy series based on the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' novels by George R.R. Martin.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the TV show 'Doctor Who'?
Questions.Explanation: The Doctor, a time-traveling alien with the ability to regenerate, is the central character in Doctor Who.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the adventures of a high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer?
Questions.Explanation: Breaking Bad tells the story of Walter White, a chemistry teacher who becomes a drug lord.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: Stranger Things is set in the town of Hawkins, Indiana, where supernatural events occur.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies?
Questions.Explanation: The Walking Dead follows a group of survivors as they navigate a world filled with zombies.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the spaceship in the TV show 'Battlestar Galactica'?
Questions.Explanation: Galactica is the name of the last surviving Battlestar in the TV show Battlestar Galactica.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in a post-apocalyptic world where society is divided into factions based on personality traits?
Questions.Explanation: Divergent is a dystopian series based on the novels by Veronica Roth, set in a divided society.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the TV show 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: Eleven, a young girl with telekinetic powers, is one of the main characters in Stranger Things.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in a future where human-like robots called 'synths' exist?
Questions.Explanation: Humans is a sci-fi series that explores the impact of synthetic humans on society.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the spaceship in the TV show 'The Expanse'?
Questions.Explanation: Rocinante is the name of the spaceship crewed by the main characters in The Expanse.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the adventures of a time-traveling alien and his companions?
Questions.Explanation: Doctor Who is a long-running sci-fi series about the Doctor, a time-traveling alien.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional continent in the TV show 'Game of Thrones'?
Questions.Explanation: Westeros is the main continent in the Game of Thrones universe, home to the Seven Kingdoms.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in a future where a totalitarian regime controls society?
FalseAnswer: The Man in the High Castle
Questions.Explanation: The Handmaid's Tale depicts a dystopian society where women are oppressed and used for reproductive purposes.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the spaceship in the TV show 'The Orville'?
Questions.Explanation: The Orville is the name of the spaceship commanded by Captain Ed Mercer in the TV show.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in a future where consciousness can be transferred to different bodies?
Questions.Explanation: Altered Carbon takes place in a future where people can transfer their consciousness to new bodies.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'Twin Peaks'?
Questions.Explanation: Twin Peaks is a small town in Washington state that serves as the setting for the show.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the adventures of a time-traveling alien and his companions?
Questions.Explanation: Doctor Who is a long-running sci-fi series about the Doctor, a time-traveling alien.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the spaceship in the TV show 'The Expanse'?
Questions.Explanation: Rocinante is the name of the spaceship crewed by the main characters in The Expanse.
